en.av_c1: Second pass: moving from left to right, find the element with the second greatest value.
en.av_c2: For each element moving through the list: the biggest seen so far is shown in green.
en.av_c3: Compare to biggest seen so far.
en.av_c4: Found something bigger, so switch value of bigindex.
en.av_c5: Now swap the next biggest element into place.
